fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 80.57 lakh crore compared with Rs 337.55 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 36.95 points or 0.21% to settle at 17,856.50. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 2.26% to 12.745. Adani Enterprises, RIL and Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The February 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 23 February 2023.
